Html:
Hi, all!

I've downloaded source code this control and looked all files when code contains P tag. Replaces to DIV tag, recompiled.
And then I write the text and see html code, the contol shows me that my text into div tags.

But if I press Ctrl+A and remove all text and write again, new text will be into P tags(((

How can I always use div tags??? Is it possible?
